groups.group_header: May we contact you about free screenings and community programs or motivational message?

sections.section_title: TSSC Enrollment | Nutrition and Physical Activity Questionnaire

groups.group_header: We are interested in 3 types of physical activity: STRENUOUS, MODERATE, AND MILD. Strenuous activities cause large increase in breathing or hear rate while moderate activities cause small increase in breathing or heart rate. Mild activities require minimal efforts. We will ask you separately about each type of activity.

questions.question_text: BP reading is hypertensive. Did you refer participant to PCP?
Has participant received TSSC Welcome Flyer?
Which TSSC components has this participant received?
May we contact you about free screenings and community programs or motivational message?
Have you received a flu vaccine THIS FLU SEASON (anytime since August)?
If yes, did you receive a flu vaccine from  Tu Salud ¡Si Cuenta!?
If “Yes” please indicate the type of insurance you have
What is your yearly household income from all sources? Family size income
Is your yearly houshold income from all sources greater than the amount indicated above?
Has a physician ever diagnosed you with Diabetes?
How many portions of fruit (of any sort) do you eat on a typical day?
How many portions of vegetables (excluding potatoes) do you eat on a typical day?

If you report that you do not eat 5 or more regular servings of fruits and vegetables every day, do you intend to change what you eat so you will eat at least 5 servings of fruits and vegetables every day?
*** READ THIS TO THE PARTICIPANT BEFORE YOU ASK QUESTIONS

We are interested in 3 types of physical activity: STRENUOUS, MODERATE, AND MILD. Strenuous activities cause large increase in breathing or hear rate while moderate activities cause small increase in breathing or heart rate. Mild activities require minimal efforts. We will ask you separately about each type of activity.

During a typical 7-day period (a week), how many times a week on an average do you do strenuous exercise where your heart beats rapidly (e.g. running, jogging, football, soccer, basketball, roller skating, vigorous swimming, vigorous long distance bicycling) for more than 10 minutes during your free time?
On occasion when you do strenuous exercise, what is average number of minutes you exercise?

During a typical 7-day period (a week), how many times a week on an average do you do moderate exercise, not exhausting (e.g. fast walking, baseball, tennis, easy bicycling, dancing) for more than 10 minutes during your free time?
On occasion when you do moderate exercise, what is average number of minutes you exercise?

During a typical 7-day period (a week), how many times a week on an average do you do mild exercise, requiring minimal effort (e.g. yoga, fishing from river bank, bowling, golf, easy walking) for more than 10 minutes during your free time?
On occasion when you do mild exercise, what is average number of minutes you exercise?
In a typical week, how much time on average do you spend sitting daily?
Based on the information you provided me about your physical activity, how many minutes of moderate or strenuous physical activity do you usually perform every week?

If you perform less than 30 minutes of physical activity every day, do you intend to change your physical activity routine so you will perform at least 30 minutes of moderate or strenuous physical activity 5 days a week?
If you reported that you have been doing moderate or strenuous physical activity for 30 minutes or more 5 days a week. For how many months have you been doing it?
Has the participant completed the HHSC evaluation?
Does the participant wish to continue with follow-up visits?

options: Participant was too busy for the program
Participant has other family matters to attend to

questions.question_text: Would you like to screen for our DPP program?

We have a new study that will be starting soon that involves completing questionnaires at enrollment, 6 months and 9 months. This study will be evaluating Tu Salud Si Cuenta and new components. If you would like to participate in this, you will be provided with incentives during the 3 different timepoints (for a total of $75) and your participation will help us improve services in the community.
I am giving permission to be contacted for new study
Participant enrolled in or referred by Salud y Vida?

May we contact you about free screening & community programs or 
 motivational messages through text message and/or email?

options: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

questions.question_text: Do you rent or own your home?
How many people live with you (total household size)?
What is your household income from all sources (in US dollar)?
Is your yearly household income from all sources greater than any amount indicated above?
If yes, please indicate the type of insurance you have?
Is participant being screened for DPP or TSSC?
